metadata.title: RHSA-2020:4401: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 7.3 security update (Important)
metadata.description:
Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 7 is a platform for Java applications based on the WildFly application runtime.

This asynchronous patch is a security update for Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 7.3 for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6, 7, and 8.

Security Fix(es):

* jackson-databind: FasterXML DOMDeserializer insecure entity expansion is vulnerable to XML external entity (CVE-2020-25649)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, see the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2020-25649 jackson-databind: FasterXML DOMDeserializer insecure entity expansion is vulnerable to XML external entity (XXE)

platform: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 7.3 for RHEL 6

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 is installed
eap7-jackson-databind is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
